2-3 Artist 4.2-3_Artist_4_a: Za dovršiti kuću, sve što trebamo napraviti je nacrtati kvadrat!

2-3 Artist 6.2-3_Artist_6_a: Da napraviš ove male kuteve, trebaš skrenuti svaki puta _dalje_ nego što si s kvadratom.
2-3 Artist 6.2-3_Artist_6_b: Budući da sam već usmjeren desno, najlakše je krenuti naprijed, zatim raditi skretanja ulijevo da napravimo trokut.

helloworld_animals_click.hw_click_sprites: Kliknite na spriteove dok je program pokrenut.

helloworld_emoji_click.hw_click_sprites: Kliknite na spriteove dok je program pokrenut.

helloworld_food_click.hw_click_sprites: Kliknite na spriteove dok je program pokrenut.

helloworld_retro_click.hw_click_sprites: Kliknite na spriteove dok je program pokrenut.

helloworld_emoji_location.location_pin_hint:
Da bi promijenili lokaciju spritea, klikni pribadaču na bloku lokacije, a zatim klikni kamo želiš da ide.

![](https://images.code.org/e3267d2b50f754befc63744be14287ac-image-1633360873408.gif)

helloworld_emoji_multi.storyboard_costume:
Provjerite odgovaraju li kostimi za svaki sprite.
<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteSay">
      <title name="SPEECH">Look at me!</title>
      <value name="SPRITE">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <title name="ANIMATION">"emoji_14_1"</title>
        </block>
      </value>
    </block></xml>

helloworld_emoji_say.hello-world-first-solution-emoji:
Kako bi emotikoni nešto rekli, povežite blokove koda na sljedeći način:

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false"><next>  <block type="gamelab_makeNewSpriteAnon">
    <title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"emoji_19"</title>
    <value name="LOCATION">
      <block type="gamelab_location_picker">
        <title name="LOCATION">{"x":200,"y":200}</title>
      </block>
    </value><next>  <block type="gamelab_spriteSay">
    <title name="SPEECH">Hello, world!</title>
    <value name="SPRITE">
      <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
        <title name="ANIMATION">"emoji_19"</title>
      </block>
    </value>
  </block></next>
  </block></next></block>
</xml>
